ðŸ“– Summary: SimpMusic is a free and open-source Android music player that utilizes YouTube Music as its backend. It offers a variety of features, including ad-free playback, background play, offline support, synced lyrics, and integration with services like Musixmatch, Spotify, SponsorBlock, and Return YouTube Dislike. The app aims to provide a comprehensive music listening experience by combining the vast library of YouTube Music with the convenience of a dedicated music player.
